definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

pinyin: bing3 tong2 suan1 tuo1 qing1 mei2

sentences.english: This paper reviews the biological properties of pyruvate decarboxylase and its application.
sentences.chinese: 該文綜述了丙酮酸脫羧酶生物學性質及其應用前景。

sentences.english: When wheat plants allowed to become deficient in potassium, pyruvate kinase activity increased.
sentences.chinese: 當小麥植株令其缺鉀時，丙酮酸激酶活性隨之升高。

sentences.english: Pyruvate and dihydroxyacetone are all three carbon metabolites of carbohydrate metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 丙酮酸和二羥丙酮都是糖代謝過程中的三碳化合物。

sentences.english: Some holoenzymes , such as pyruvate dehydrogenase , are highly complex , with several cofactors.
sentences.chinese: 有一些全酶是高度複雜的，如丙酮酸脫氫酶。

sentences.english: These two amino acids derive their carbon skeletons from pyruvate .
sentences.chinese: 這兩個氨基酸從丙酮酸獲得它們的碳架。

sentences.english: The technological processing of calcium Pyruvate form egg shell is studied.
sentences.chinese: 對蛋殼爲原料製備丙酮酸鈣的工藝條件進行了研究。

sentences.english: Pyruvate plays an important role in metabolism and the energy production process.
sentences.chinese: 丙酮酸鹽充當在新陳代謝和發電過程的一個重要角色。

sentences.english: Their hope was that, overwhelmed with pyruvate, the mitochondria would be forced to respond.
sentences.chinese: 希望，當丙酮酸蓄積時，線粒體就會被迫產生反應。

sentences.english: This article studies the synthesis of sodium pyruvate from tartaric acid.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了酒石酸合成丙酮酸鈉的工藝。

sentences.english: The method based on pyruvic acid or pyruvate as starting material was considered to be the best one.
sentences.chinese: 其中以丙酮酸或丙酮酸酯爲原料的合成方法爲最佳。

sentences.english: The method based on pyruvic acid or pyruvate as starting material was considered to be the best one.
sentences.chinese: 其中以丙酮酸或丙酮酸酯爲原料的合成方法爲最佳。

definition: catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
citric acid cycle/Krebs cycle/tricarboxylic acid cycle
